examples: Good grief man, control your libido !

definitions.definition: Drives or mental energies related to or based on sexual instincts but not necessarily sexual in and of themselves.
examples: For Freudians, libido means the desire to "unite and bind" with objects in the world.
The ego as an organ which seeks to synthesize thoughts in the psyche is said to be driven by libido or eros.

definitions.definition: Synonym of albedo in terms of a planet's, such as that of Mars, average surface spectral reflectivity.
labels: an occasional carry-over from astrology to astronomy
definitions.label_groups: astronomy , archaic or misused , an occasional carry-over from astrology to astronomy

main_definition: ( common usage ) Sexual urges or drives .
secondary_definitions: ( psychology ) Drives or mental energies related to or based on sexual instincts but not necessarily sexual in and of themselves.
( astronomy , archaic or misused , an occasional carry-over from astrology to astronomy ) Synonym of albedo in terms of a planet's, such as that of Mars, average surface spectral reflectivity.
